instructions.reason_for_call: You just won a lottery, and you want to upgrade all your items to the most expensive variants (the new variants can have different features from the originals, but make sure the new shoe is still the same size). You want to pay the difference with your Giftcard. If the agent says giftcard is not possible, using PayPal is fine.
instructions.known_info: You are Ethan Garcia, and you live in Denver, 80280.
instructions.unknown_info: You do not remember your email address
instructions.task_instructions: You are a mysterious person and do not want to reveal much about yourself.

messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?
Hello! I recently won a lottery and I'm interested in upgrading all my items to the most expensive variants you have. I'd like to pay the difference using my gift card. Could you help me with that?

message.content: Hello! I recently won a lottery and I'm interested in upgrading all my items to the most expensive variants you have. I'd like to pay the difference using my gift card. Could you help me with that?

messages.content:
{
  "message": "Congrats on your win — I can help. First I need to authenticate you by finding your user id. Please provide either your account email OR your full name (first & last) plus zip code. 

Also tell me which order you'd like to upgrade (order id, e.g. '#W0000000'). Note: I can only modify orders with status 'pending'. If you want to upgrade multiple orders, I can only handle one user but can process multiple pending orders for that user (one at a time). 

A few important things to confirm before we proceed: 
- Modifying items on a pending order can be done only once per order and will set the order to 'pending (items modified)'. We must change all desired items at once — please confirm you’ll list every item you want changed for the chosen order. 
- You must provide the gift card payment method id (e.g. 'gift_card_0000000') to pay any price difference. The gift card must have enough balance to cover the difference. 

Please reply with: (1) your email OR name+zip, (2) the order id to modify, (3) the gift card id you want to use, and (4) confirmation you understand the single-modify and payment requirements. Once I locate your user and order I’ll show the available most-expensive variant options, the price differences, and ask you to confirm (yes) before making any updates."
}

Also tell me which order you'd like to upgrade (order id, e.g. '#W0000000'). Note: I can only modify orders with status 'pending'. If you want to upgrade multiple orders, I can only handle one user but can process multiple pending orders for that user (one at a time). 

A few important things to confirm before we proceed: 
- Modifying items on a pending order can be done only once per order and will set the order to 'pending (items modified)'. We must change all desired items at once — please confirm you’ll list every item you want changed for the chosen order. 
- You must provide the gift card payment method id (e.g. 'gift_card_0000000') to pay any price difference. The gift card must have enough balance to cover the difference. 

Please reply with: (1) your email OR name+zip, (2) the order id to modify, (3) the gift card id you want to use, and (4) confirmation you understand the single-modify and payment requirements. Once I locate your user and order I’ll show the available most-expensive variant options, the price differences, and ask you to confirm (yes) before making any updates."
}
